title: Majestique Evolvus
detail: Majestique Evolvus blends contemporary sophistication with spacious living in an elegant community. These thoughtfully designed 2, 3, and 4 BHK residences offer a perfect mix of luxury and functionality. Enjoy premium features such as modern modular kitchens, advanced climate control systems, and stylish glass partitions. With expansive private balconies, beautifully landscaped gardens, and exclusive amenities including a state-of-the-art clubhouse and fitness center, Majestique Evolvus provides a refined living experience where comfort meets innovation.
developer_detail: Majestique Landmarks, is known for its diverse residential developments across Pune, catering to various demographics. Majestique has become synonymous with quality and customer satisfaction. Each completed project marks the happiness of numerous families, while ongoing endeavors reflect Majestique's commitment to innovation and excellence.
city_description: Kharadi, located in the eastern corridor of Pune, has transformed from a quiet suburb into a bustling IT and residential hub. Its strategic location near the airport and major IT parks, coupled with a growing social infrastructure
